Class LigandTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ammar257ammar.psnpbind.core.utils.LigandTools

  • public class LigandTools
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to manipulate ligand files mainly using CDK (Mol2 and SMILES formats)
    Author:
    Ammar Ammar
